title: BMAT06
reasons_remedies: Rejected blister sensed on conveyor.. a. Check if rejected blister are falling on conveyor.
Trims falling on conveyor. a. check if trims is falling on conveyor, adjust rejection shute to avoide trims in conveyor.
Sensor sensing the conveyor or blister droped on conveyor. a. Follow below teaching procedre to adjust the sensor range.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMAT06
Error Code 06
Category: BMAT
Title: BMAT06
Alarm Message: Rejected Blister on Conveyor Track 2
Reason & Remedy:
1. Rejected blister sensed on conveyor.. a. Check if rejected blister are falling on conveyor.
2. Trims falling on conveyor. a. check if trims is falling on conveyor, adjust rejection shute to avoide trims in conveyor.
3. Sensor sensing the conveyor or blister droped on conveyor. a. Follow below teaching procedre to adjust the sensor range.
